title_zh: W51 核心 · 辯論與觀點

turns.en: Let’s discuss this topic: remote work is better than office work.
turns.zh: 我們來討論：遠距工作比辦公室更好。

turns.en: Okay. I think remote work is better overall.
turns.zh: 好。我覺得遠距整體更好。

turns.en: It saves commuting time and improves focus.
It can be harder, but tools help a lot.
turns.zh: 確實較難，但工具很有幫助。

turns.en: We use short daily check-ins and shared docs.
turns.zh: 我們用每日短會和共用文件。

turns.en: What’s a downside of remote work?
Regular video chats and occasional meetups.
Now argue the opposite side briefly.
Office work can build trust faster.
turns.zh: 辦公室更容易建立信任。
